name: FartNoises
0:
”Alexa, open Fart Noises”
”Alexa, start Fart Noises”
”Alexa, Launch Fart Noises”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fart noises
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Fart Noises is the funniest (and stinkiest, obviously), fart skill! Try the new fart compilation, up to 100 farts and goofy sounds one after the other!
Once you're using the skill, try saying "fart compilation" to try the new feature! Choose a number of farts and enjoy the stinkiest show in town!

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:
- Enable this Alexa skill.
- On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
- Click + to add a new routine.
- Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
- Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
- Choose "Your Skills".
- Select this skill.
- Click Next.
- Choose Device to perform the routine to.
- Click Save.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
